charges.charge_description: 18:1341 &; 2 POSTAL, INTERSTATE WIRE, RADIO, ETC./MAIL FRAUD &; AIDING AND ABETTING (CT 1 Oct 20, 1993) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft pleaded guilty to ct 1 of 2-ct indictment filed 1/6/94; ordered that deft pay a special assessment of $50 for ct 1 due immediately; deft is committed to custody of US BOP for 3 months; deft is to receive credit for time served; deft is remanded to custody of US marshal; upon release deft shall be on supervised release for 3 years; deft shall make restitution in the amount of $26,325 to Clerk US District Court for disbursement to Gladys Billman, Martha L Martin, Ruth Osborn and Vivian E Pfleiderer; JUDGMENT FOR REVOCATION OF PROBATION probation revoked; 1 yr imprisonment; dft pay restitution in amount of $26, 325; (8) (1)

charges.charge_description: Knowingly and willfully cuase a check to be delivered by U.S. mail, in furtherance and execution of a scheme to defraud and to obtain money by false pretenses, in violation of 18 USC 1341. [3:93-m-483]
WIRE, RADIO, ETC./MAIL FRAUD &; AIDING AND ABETTING. (Ct 1 Oct 20, 1993) (Ct 2 Dec 1, 1993) (1-2)
Mail Fraud, in violation of 18 USC 1341 [3:93-m-489]
